body:
Hello, I have posted a ban appeal, yet for some reason my friend whom im skyping says he is unable to see it :\
I posted it in the appeal an infraction section.,. yet still hasn't been answered
body_tagged:

title: Please read staff.

replies.body:
Other people can't see your appeals, only staff can.
It can take up to a couple days to get a response, so just have patience :)
replies.body_tagged:
Other people can't see your appeals, only staff can.
It can take up to a couple days to get a response, so just have patience :)

replies.body: Thanks Porkyyy, yet it has been atleast 3 days.. I want it to be answered ;-; #BestServer :D
replies.body_tagged: Thanks Porkyyy, yet it has been atleast 3 days.. I want it to be answered ;-; #BestServer :D

replies.body:
Hi 5ivee!

I apologize for the wait. There are a couple of appeals before yours, but a Senior Moderator will be reviewing it very shortly. Thank you for your patience :)! Have a nice day!
